para: This format supports Humminbird waypoints (.hwr files).
If you do "save all nav data" on the device, you'll get a data.hwr file on the flash card (on a 797 in the matrix directory).

Supported models:
797c2i SI
(They should all work, but this is the only one tested so far.)

Known limits:
max 12 characters for waypoint names. Only does waypoints. Tracks are in a different file (like 000.ht).
